entity

Class BusinessWeek

  • entity.BusinessWeek
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Bean, Versionable

    public class BusinessWeek
implements Bean, Versionable
    List of businessweeks.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      Boolean AppliesToAllZones
      True if this businessweek applies to all zones (in which case BusinessWeekZones should be empty). If false and BusinessWeekZones has elements, this businessweek applies to those zones. If false and BusinessWeekZones is empty, this businessweek doesn't apply anywhere.
      Integer BeanVersion
      Auto-incremented object version
      Date BusinessDayDemarcation
      Demarcation of the business day
      Weekdays BusinessWeekEnd
      What day the business week ends.
      BusinessWeekZone[] BusinessWeekZones
      The zones that observe this businessweek.
      ZoneSearchCriteria FilterCriteria
      The filter criteria, used for the region UI only.
      Boolean FridayBusinessDay
      Is Friday a business day.
      Date FridayBusinessEnd
      End of business day on Friday.
      Date FridayBusinessStart
      Start of business day on Friday.
      Key ID
      Internally managed primary key
      Long LoadCommandID
      LoadCommand for load where row was created. If not null this object was loaded via the loader.
      Boolean MondayBusinessDay
      Is Monday a business day.
      Date MondayBusinessEnd
      End of business day on Monday.
      Date MondayBusinessStart
      Start of business day on Monday.
      String Name
      The name of a businessweek in the business calendar.
      BusinessWeek_Name_L10N[] Name_L10N_ARRAY
      String Name_en_US
      String Name_ja_JP
      String PublicID
      ID or primary key of the row in the external system to which this row is mapped
      Boolean SaturdayBusinessDay
      Is Saturday a business day.
      Date SaturdayBusinessEnd
      End of business day on Saturday.
      Date SaturdayBusinessStart
      Start of business day on Saturday.
      Boolean SundayBusinessDay
      Is Sunday a business day.
      Date SundayBusinessEnd
      End of business day on Sunday.
      Date SundayBusinessStart
      Start of business day on Sunday.
      Boolean ThursdayBusinessDay
      Is Thursday a business day.
      Date ThursdayBusinessEnd
      End of business day on Thursday.
      Date ThursdayBusinessStart
      Start of business day on Thursday.
      Boolean TuesdayBusinessDay
      Is Tuesday a business day.
      Date TuesdayBusinessEnd
      End of business day on Tuesday.
      Date TuesdayBusinessStart
      Start of business day on Tuesday.
      Boolean WednesdayBusinessDay
      Is Wednesday a business day.
      Date WednesdayBusinessEnd
      End of business day on Wednesday.
      Date WednesdayBusinessStart
      Start of business day on Wednesday.
      String[] ZoneCodes
      An array of the region's zones. If the filter criteria is set, it filters the return set by the filter criteria.
      List<Object> ZoneList
      Returns an alphabetized arraylist of the zones covered by the given region. Zones are represented as strings. Strips leading and trailing whitespace.
      String Zones
      Returns an alphabetized arraylist of the zones covered by the given region. Zones are represented as strings. Strips leading and trailing whitespace.

      • getBusinessWeekZonesQuery

        IQueryBeanResult<BusinessWeekZone> getBusinessWeekZonesQuery(ZoneType zt)
        This returns the set of BusinessWeekZones of the specified type.
        Parameters:
        zt - the zonetype to filter the BusinessWeekZone objects by.
        Returns:
        a queryprocessor of BusinessWeekZone

      • containsZone

        boolean containsZone(Country country,
                   ZoneType zoneType,
                   String zone)
        If this region contains a zone of the given type and value? The string matching is case-insensitive NOTE: this will not match if a zip+4 value is provided. You must strip off the +4 before passing to this method.
        Parameters:
        country -
        zoneType - the zone type, must not be null
        zone - the zone string, must not be null
        Returns:
        true if the region containsZone a zone of the given type, false otherwise

        Set the zones (comma-delimited list) for the region.

        zones - comman separated list of zones

      • validateOnlyOneBusinessWeekAppliesToAll

        String validateOnlyOneBusinessWeekAppliesToAll()
        Returns:
        an error message String if this BusinessWeek's AppliesToAllZones is set to true, and there are other BusinessWeek's that have AppliesToAllZones set to true
